headline: ADM Credit Outlook Lowered by Moody’s on Accounting Issues
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Moody’s Investors Service lowered its outlook for Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.’s credit score, citing weaknesses in the crop trader’s controls over the reporting of some transactions.Most Read from BloombergThe Leaf Blowers Will Not Go QuietlyArizona Elections Signal Robust Immigration Enforcement Under TrumpScoring an Architectural Breakthrough in Denver’s RiNo DistrictKey Ballot Initiatives and Local Races Highlight Views on Abortion, ImmigrationThe move came after ADM said on Mon

headline: ADM Declares Cash Dividend
summary: CHICAGO, November 08, 2024--ADM’s (NYSE: ADM) Board of Directors has declared a cash dividend of 50.0 cents per share on the company’s common stock. The dividend is payable on Dec. 12, 2024, to shareholders of record on Nov. 21, 2024.
